phrases: If you are not paying attention, be prepared for a poking attack from my fingers
I am little, but I will squish you; you are as tiny as a flea to me
What I want is a plastic heart (plus, plus, but it is a minus)
But that is boring; when I would notice it, I would have won against you
Love is something that is bittersweet
Simple and clear yet complex and strange stuff
I am only worrying about things that do not matter
You are gentle and sincere yet eccentric
I pretend to be strong all over and compete against you
Just by being honest, it is so stimulating and I feel dizzy
I get hurt, I hurt you, in a preparation of pure feelings
In my head, there is always a pre-parade of pure feelings all by myself
Then let us put salt on
Because I want you to know more about me
More than anyone else, I want to bare my self
But I cannot do it, I have got nothing for experience
But a love that is just sweet
Is slightly different from what I am seeking
If I am told it is white
I would say it is black
I say one thing but do another
If I am told, I love you
I would say, I hate you
I am happy, but what am I saying?
Do not run in the hallways!
Aisaka-senpai, we have been blessed with good fortune thanks to you!
I have absolutely no connection with them.
How dare they act so indecent this early in the morning!
What the hell is wrong with you guys?!
Why did you dodge us, Taiga?
I will not ask you to bite me.
You can just step on me with your feet like this,
and then rub my head against your armpits.
Do not come near me, you guys.
With all this jinxing going on something must be wrong.
Stupid Chi', what the hell are you doing?
See, I proved that the rumor was false.
I have received bad luck already!
Do not smear it on my skirt!
You got some sticky stuff on me.
How are you going to pay for it?
You see, things happened to the guests who watched our pro wrestling show during the cultural festival,
especially to the ones who were kicked and hit by Taiga.
Basically, everyone touched by Taiga was blessed with good fortune.
others suddenly inherited huge fortunes from previously unknown grandfathers.
It is like absolutely any wish will be granted.
That is the Legend of the Palmtop Tiger of Happiness which is circulating.
So that is what is going on.
Do not act like you are close to me!
Regardless of how many people try, I will not let anyone touch me.
Why are all of you gathered around here -
The only one who can touch me is Minorin!
So you will become happy if you touch Taiga, huh?
On that day, Taiga must have been really far away from happiness.
If Taiga made anyone happy on that day,
Hurry up and give me my lunch box.
I mean, he is like the closest to Aisaka-san.
Aisaka-san looked like she had a lot of fun while dancing with Maruo.
They say you will receive good fortune if you touch her,
but it is so ironic that he is always by her side.
She was even stolen from him so easily by Maruo at the cultural festival.
Yeah, Kitamura-kun stole me away from you.
Hey, should not you stop these rumors?
Well, as a dog's ex-girlfriend, my feelings are a bit mixed.
I am a human, after all, but it seems like I abandoned you.
I should never worry about you.
Now it is time to get back to my seat.
The unmarried woman with her unmarried face will come to start the unmarried homeroom!
Oh, Takasu-kun's lunch box looks as delicious as usual!
O-Oh, I just wrapped some leftover salad with rice paper.
Takasu-kun is amazing, the rice is amazing as well!
Sheesh, I cannot even eat in peace.
That is not convincing at all.
May I sit with you guys?
Aisaka, do not get overwhelmed by the cultural festival rumor.
Speaking of which, the cultural festival was amazing!
Our class won everything; the class showdown,
the beauty contest, and Mr. Lucky Guy!
Yeah, it was all thanks to you, Aisaka.
I will not drink anything but orange juice!
Do you understand what is happening?
Well, I guess it is good that she is back to normal.
but I have a test soon.
Anyway, just give me a little more time.
All right, I will call later.
Who were you on the phone with?
Oh, do you want to know my secret?
My gosh, you are such a kid.
Not me, it is for Taiga.
She said she does not want coffee or milk.
I had no other choice but to drink from the tap!
How are you going to make up for it?!
Aisaka-senpai, I had a favor to ask of you,
so I thought I would pick up the juice and ask.
You have been following me around for some time now.
Oh, the one who thought he would be blessed with good fortune if he touched you...
Well, I have someone I like very much!
It is a game of survival to receive happiness.
Come on, let us go, lunch break is nearly over.
They say pictures from the cultural festival were put up.
I have finished it already, so hurry up!
You are holding me pretty tightly too.
Do not make it sound so sick!
That is right, I have touched Taiga so much,
theoretically I should be the happiest person.
God, she looks really happy in that picture.
But you know, it is a great picture.
Taiga, listen, pay close attention to Amin in number 200.
You are such a shockingly perverted dog.
Sheesh, sometimes your libido is so strong that I want to kill you.
That is a great way to cross the line.
If you are interested in Stupid Chi's underboob,
then I will tell you about it.
I am getting dirtier just from being around you.
Minorin, I am checking out that side.
Takasu-kun, it is time to begin...
I will now sacrifice 90 yen and summon 9 pictures here.
Then I will reveal my face-down card!
Picture number 93, which includes the under-classmen from the baseball club, will cost just 10 yen.
It is your turn now, Takasu-kun.
I am just asking you to show me which pictures you are buying.
You should summon the class group photo...
No, do not get the wrong -
I will buy this one too so I can have the memory.
You are only buying pictures of Sugou from Class B.
How could you like her pictures?
Then, let us go to that shop next time.
Everyone is getting so hyped up because of a few pictures.
You know, photo shoots are part of my job.
The pictures are sold all over Japan.
I do not really care who has my pictures or what they think about them.
In the end, they are just pictures.
My, my, as expected of Amin-sensei!
Can we drop by the station today?
Do you have something to do there?
Oh, my foretold wealth is decreasing...
What do you want from the back of an unmarried person, Kawashima-san?
I have noticed it this morning...
Your wool sweater was shown in this year's Winter Collection, right?
Wearing such good brands shows that you are very mature.
I think everyone will understand your mature charm.
Let us go to the supermarket before we head back.
I also pay for the food, you know!
Are you acting all tough because you bought the picture with you and Minorin holding hands?
I knew you would buy it.
D-Did not you buy a picture too?
It is not like I need it,
Oh, the person from a while ago.
T-This time, you want to peek up my skirt?
She is back to how she was before the cultural festival, huh?
Even though something like that happened...
No, it is because it happened.
President, the total cost of the cultural festival has been calculated.
It is probably the Legend of the Palmtop Tiger of Happiness.
They say that your wishes will come true if Aisaka Taiga touches you.
It is just a rumor, though.
So Tomiie was testing it, huh?
It does not matter if it is a rumor or a lie.
It is understandable that people want to put faith in these superstitious ideas.
I am surprised that you would say something like that.
I have something to tell you.
In the end, I did not get touched by Taiga.
I really envy the girls she touched.
Taiga is also living happily ever after with Maruo now.
It is impossible that Taiga could like Maruo!
Whoever believes that jinx is a dumb-ass.
It is like, as long as it has to do with love,
you can make anything come true.
You are so mature and you have a great body.
I do not think there is a guy in the world who is out of your reach.
Are not you really trying hard?
It is all right to look so serious when you are troubled, but...
Takasu-kun, you are being watched by undercover security guards.
Cannot you at least smile while you shop?
But you know, you can buy a four-pack of pork for the same price.
If you are troubled by the price, why do not you go touch Aisaka-san?
You might inherit a fortune from some grandfather you have never heard of.
Hey, you will be blessed with good fortune if you touch Taiga, right?
But what if it is true?
What should I do to make Taiga herself be blessed by good fortune?
I guess you should choose quantity over quality,
since she will not have any complaints as long as she is full.
All right, I will get the pork.
Oh, I do not need a plastic bag.
Takasu-kun, you are like a housewife for collecting these points.
I am giving it to you.
There are only three people in my house,
so one or two packs is enough.
Even if I took it, I would not know how to cook it.
Whatever, you should eat some pork.
You do not look well today.
You are probably lacking vitamin B2.
You did not look well this morning.
You are like a nosy old lady...
I bet all you are eating is fast food.
How dare he ditch his master and leave first?
Did you lose your wallet or something?
Were you bullied by that evil student council president?
I do not understand what is going on,
but you can touch me if you want.
Come on, touch me however you want.
Touch me as much as you want!
I am sorry, it is okay.
Yeah, Sakura-chan, I am honestly fine.
Sheesh, why did you leave without me?
Hey Ryuuji, there is a lot of food.
Is it some special day today?
Uh... I did not have lunch, so I am very hungry.
You are good at this type of cooking too?
Yeah, it is western-style boiled pork.
The special thing about it is that Shinshuu miso was added to the vinegar.
I cannot lose to the restaurant that your father took me to.
Then you put melted cheese on it -
I told you, I am fine already.
Never mind, hurry up and finish cooking.
The Legend of the Palmtop Tiger of Happiness, huh?
Honestly, it is the stupidest thing I have ever heard.
Oh, I can feel the good fortune already!
That is a bit too quick.
The fact that I am able to rub you like this...
The fact that I am able to have meals with my family...
This all makes me the happiest person in the world.
Our family is made up of three people!
If you touch the Palmtop Tiger, any wish can come true.
I think I want to stay here.
Yeah, I have made new friends,
I am fine, I am also trying my best.
Yeah, people say I am mature now.
What sort of wish... will I make?
Although I cannot really make out the form of my wish yet...
Or rather, I do not want to see it.
You said it ten times without biting your tongue.
Wait, what do you mean by stop?
